channel.title: Chinese bot
channel.description:
have you noticed a lot of lvl3s with chinese names in varrock and fally yewing recently? thats because the company called Zhong Tian Wang Luo is selling a rs bot called RS-RBOT 6.2 below is a translation of the stuff on the site (if u cant read chinese) it costs 800 rmb a month (abt 100 usd) there is an ip auth the person is charging 300 rmb (abt 45us) for any extra scripts. The site claims that it can run 8-12 bots on 512meg ram (aryan could run 8 on my 512 comp) and 15-25 bots on 1 gig ram The person says to trial the program you need 200 rmb deposit any extra scripts cost 300rmb each and will take 24 hrs to complete basically thats all, i read this from the google cache http://66.102.7.104/search?q=cache:a7zgyvNfKvQJ:www.skrgame.com/+site:skrgame.com&hl=en&gl=sg&ct=clnk&cd=1 the current site front page is advertising about some yahoo messenger spammer [br][size=1]Posted at: August 12, 2006, 09:35:23 AM[/size][hr]and from the structure of the folder configs controllers library logs randoms jiaoben (scripts)
and the structure of aryan botclasses configs controllers logs output randoms scripts
it was a fixed version of aryan (wonder how they did that tho)

item.description:
@mod_joery wrote:

omfg :s

They asking that mutch ?

Dam they gonna earn fast money then :s

Transulation from the site

YAHOO! Passes group sending immediately!

Software unit price: Each machine 100 Yuan

This software may send the news to the good friend group, automatically supports the multi- account numbers to trade the number group to send in turn, the use is only needs to induct the account number, the input transmission content. Has the transmitting speed quickly, the operation simple, the function formidable, the stability is good and so on the merit.

(Please act according to oneself computer system edition downloading corresponding procedure)

YHAOO passes (simplified version) immediately:[ Downloading address ]

YHAOO simplified form version group sending:[ Downloading address ]

YHAOO passes (traditional version) immediately:[ Downloading address ]

YHAOO traditional form version group sending:[ Downloading address ]
